name: crossplay-frontend-tests
description: Comprehensive test coverage for CrossPlay frontend - all user stories verified via Chrome MCP browser automation

userStories.title: User registration with credentials
userStories.description: As a new user, I can register with username, email, and password
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to the app and open auth modal
Fill username, email, and password fields
Verify user is logged in (username appears in header)
Take snapshot to confirm authenticated state

userStories.title: Registration validation errors
userStories.description: As a user, I see validation errors when registration fails (duplicate email)
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to the app and open auth modal
Fill form with an existing email

userStories.title: User login with credentials
userStories.description: As a returning user, I can login with email and password
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to the app and open auth modal
Fill email and password fields with valid credentials
Verify user is logged in (username appears in header)
Take snapshot to confirm authenticated state

userStories.title: Login invalid credentials error
userStories.description: As a user, I see error messages when login fails (invalid credentials)
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to the app and open auth modal
Fill email and password fields with invalid credentials

userStories.title: Guest login without account
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can play as a guest without creating an account
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to the app and open auth modal
Verify guest user is logged in
Take snapshot showing guest authenticated state

userStories.title: User logout
userStories.description: As a user, I can logout and clear my session
acceptanceCriteria: Click on user menu in header
Verify Login/Sign Up button reappears in header
Take snapshot showing logged out state

userStories.title: Open auth modal from header
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can open the auth modal from the header
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to the app (not logged in)
Take snapshot showing Login/Sign Up button in header
Take snapshot showing modal is open

userStories.title: Switch between login and register tabs
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can switch between Login and Register tabs
acceptanceCriteria: Verify Login tab is active by default
Verify Register form is displayed (has username field)
Verify Login form is displayed (no username field)

userStories.title: Auth modal closes on success
userStories.description: As a user, the auth modal closes after successful login/register
acceptanceCriteria: Verify modal is no longer visible
Verify user is authenticated (username in header)

userStories.title: Load today's daily puzzle
userStories.description: As a player, I can load today's daily puzzle from /play
acceptanceCriteria: Verify clues are displayed (Across and Down)

userStories.title: Load archive puzzle by date
userStories.description: As a player, I can load an archive puzzle via /play?date=YYYY-MM-DD
acceptanceCriteria: Verify the puzzle corresponds to the requested date
Take snapshot of loaded archive puzzle

userStories.title: Cell selection by click
userStories.description: As a player, I can click on a cell to select it
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a cell in the grid
Verify cell has visual selection highlight
Verify new cell is selected and previous is deselected

userStories.title: Type letter to fill cell
userStories.description: As a player, I can type a letter to fill the selected cell
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a cell to select it
Verify letter appears in the selected cell

userStories.title: Cursor auto-advance after typing
userStories.description: As a player, the cursor auto-advances to the next cell after typing
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on first cell of a word
Verify cursor moved to the next cell in the word

userStories.title: Arrow key navigation
userStories.description: As a player, I can use arrow keys to navigate between cells
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a cell to select it
Press Arrow Right - verify selection moves right
Press Arrow Down - verify selection moves down
Press Arrow Left - verify selection moves left
Press Arrow Up - verify selection moves up

userStories.title: Backspace deletes and moves back
userStories.description: As a player, I can use backspace to delete a letter and move back
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Fill a few cells with letters
Verify current cell is cleared and selection moves back

userStories.title: Double-click toggles direction
userStories.description: As a player, I can click a cell twice to toggle direction (across/down)
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a cell (should highlight across word by default)
Verify word highlight changed to down direction
Verify word highlight changed back to across

userStories.title: Current word highlight
userStories.description: As a player, the current word is highlighted when a cell is selected
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a cell in the middle of an across word
Verify all cells in that word are highlighted
Verify highlight color is distinct from selected cell

userStories.title: Display current clue
userStories.description: As a player, I see the clue for the currently selected word
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Verify the clue for current word is displayed prominently
Verify clue updates to match new selection

userStories.title: Across and Down clue lists
userStories.description: As a player, I can see both Across and Down clue lists
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Verify Across clue list is visible with numbered clues
Verify Down clue list is visible with numbered clues
Take snapshot showing both clue lists

userStories.title: Click clue to jump to word
userStories.description: As a player, I can click a clue to jump to that word in the grid
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a clue in the Across list
Verify the first cell of that word is selected in the grid
Verify direction is set to Across
Click on a clue in the Down list
Verify selection jumps to that word with Down direction

userStories.title: Current clue highlighted in list
userStories.description: As a player, the current clue is highlighted in the clue list
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a cell to select a word
Verify the corresponding clue is highlighted in the clue list
Verify the highlight moves to the new clue

userStories.title: Reveal single letter hint
userStories.description: As a player, I can reveal a single letter (hint)
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Find and click the 'Reveal Letter' or hint button
Verify the correct letter appears in the cell
Verify the revealed letter has a distinct visual style

userStories.title: Reveal entire word
userStories.description: As a player, I can reveal the entire current word
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Click on a cell in an empty word
Find and click the 'Reveal Word' button
Verify all letters in the word are filled in
Verify revealed letters have distinct visual style

userStories.title: Check answers - correct cells green
userStories.description: As a player, I can check my answers and correct cells show green
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Fill in some cells with correct letters
Verify cells with correct letters show green styling

userStories.title: Check answers - incorrect cells red
userStories.description: As a player, incorrect cells show red validation
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Fill in some cells with incorrect letters
Verify cells with incorrect letters show red styling

userStories.title: Timer displays solve time
userStories.description: As a player, I see a timer tracking my solve time (MM:SS format)
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Verify timer is visible on the page
Verify timer shows time in MM:SS format
Wait a few seconds and verify timer increments

userStories.title: Progress percentage display
userStories.description: As a player, I see my progress percentage as I fill cells
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load

userStories.title: Puzzle completion celebration
userStories.description: As a player, I see a celebration and success modal when I complete the puzzle
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to /play and wait for puzzle to load
Complete the entire puzzle correctly (use reveal hints if needed)
Verify success modal appears with stats

userStories.title: View puzzle archive list
userStories.description: As a player, I can view a list of past puzzles in the archive
acceptanceCriteria: Verify list of puzzles is displayed
Verify each puzzle shows date and difficulty

userStories.title: Filter by difficulty
userStories.description: As a player, I can filter puzzles by difficulty (easy/medium/hard)
acceptanceCriteria: Verify only Easy puzzles are displayed
Verify only Hard puzzles are displayed

userStories.title: Pagination navigation
userStories.description: As a player, I can navigate between pages of archive results

userStories.title: Click puzzle navigates to play
userStories.description: As a player, clicking an archive puzzle navigates to /play?date=X
acceptanceCriteria: Take snapshot of loaded puzzle from archive

userStories.title: View profile with username and email
userStories.description: As a user, I can view my profile with username and email

userStories.title: Profile statistics display
userStories.description: As a user, I see my puzzle statistics on my profile
acceptanceCriteria: Verify puzzles solved count is displayed
Verify average solve time is displayed

userStories.title: Profile mascot display
userStories.description: As a user, I see a mascot on my profile

userStories.title: View puzzle history
userStories.description: As a user, I can view my puzzle completion history
acceptanceCriteria: Verify each entry shows puzzle date
Verify each entry shows solve time
Verify each entry shows completion status

userStories.title: Filter history by timeframe
userStories.description: As a user, I can filter history by timeframe (all/week/month/year)
acceptanceCriteria: Verify list updates to show only recent entries

userStories.title: Play Again from history
userStories.description: As a user, I can click 'Play Again' to re-solve a puzzle
acceptanceCriteria: Find a puzzle entry with 'Play Again' button
Verify navigation to /play with that puzzle loaded

userStories.title: Create multiplayer room
userStories.description: As a user, I can create a new multiplayer room
acceptanceCriteria: Verify room creation form is displayed
Select game mode, max players, puzzle options

userStories.title: Room creation form options
userStories.description: As a user, I can configure room settings (mode, players, puzzle)
acceptanceCriteria: Verify game mode selector has options (Collaborative/Race/Relay)
Verify max players selector allows 2-8 players

userStories.title: View player list in lobby
userStories.description: As a player, I can see the list of players in the room
acceptanceCriteria: Verify your name appears in the list
Verify room code is prominently displayed

userStories.title: Toggle ready status
userStories.description: As a player, I can toggle my ready status
acceptanceCriteria: Verify your status shows as ready

userStories.title: Host can start game
userStories.description: As the host, I can start the game when players are ready
acceptanceCriteria: Verify Start Game button is visible (only to host)
Verify game starts and navigates to gameplay

userStories.title: Enter room code to join
userStories.description: As a user, I can enter a room code to join
acceptanceCriteria: Verify room code input field is displayed
Take snapshot of join page and lobby

userStories.title: Invalid room code error
userStories.description: As a user, I see an error if the room code is invalid

userStories.title: Multiplayer grid interaction
userStories.description: As a player in multiplayer, I can interact with the puzzle grid
acceptanceCriteria: Click on cells and type letters
Verify letters appear in the grid

userStories.title: Chat panel in multiplayer
userStories.description: As a player, I can send and see chat messages
acceptanceCriteria: Type a message in the chat input
Verify message appears in chat history

userStories.title: Player progress display
userStories.description: As a player, I see progress indicators for each player

userStories.title: Landing page hero section
userStories.description: As a visitor, I see an engaging hero with CTA buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Verify 'Play with Friends' button is visible

userStories.title: Play Now navigation
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can click 'Play Now' to start playing

userStories.title: Daily puzzle preview
userStories.description: As a visitor, I see today's puzzle preview on the landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Verify daily puzzle preview section exists

userStories.title: Interactive demo puzzle
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can try a demo puzzle on the landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Click on a cell in the demo
Verify letter appears in the demo grid

userStories.title: Feature cards display
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can see feature cards explaining the app
acceptanceCriteria: Verify multiple feature cards are displayed
Verify each card has icon and description

userStories.title: FAQ accordion
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can expand/collapse FAQ items
acceptanceCriteria: Take snapshots of expanded and collapsed states

userStories.title: Header logo and navigation
userStories.description: As a visitor, I see the logo and can navigate via header
acceptanceCriteria: Verify logo is visible in header
Click logo and verify navigation to home

userStories.title: Header navigation links work
userStories.description: As a visitor, I can navigate to different pages via header links

userStories.title: Protected route redirect
userStories.description: As a visitor, I am redirected when accessing protected routes
acceptanceCriteria: Verify redirect to home or auth prompt
Verify redirect to home or auth prompt

userStories.title: Access protected routes when authenticated
userStories.description: As a user, I can access protected routes

userStories.title: 404 page display
userStories.description: As a visitor, I see a friendly 404 page for invalid routes
acceptanceCriteria: Verify there's a link to go home

userStories.title: Mascot appears throughout app
userStories.description: As a player, I see the Crossy mascot in various places
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate to home page and verify mascot is visible
Navigate to /play and verify mascot appears
Navigate to /profile (logged in) and verify mascot appears
Take snapshots showing mascot on different pages

metadata.instructions: Each story must be verified by navigating in browser, performing actions, and taking snapshots to confirm the user flow works end-to-end
